Magic
Spell Slots: P1: 11; P2: 11; P3: 10; P4: 9; P5: 7; P6: 5; P7: 2
Spells:
Animal Summoning II (P5 Conj): R1200' Calls 6 8 HD or 12 4 HD animals to assist self
Animal Summoning III (P6 Conj): R1600' Calls 4 16 HD, 8 8 HD, or 16 4 HD animals to assist self
Antiplant Shell (P5 Abju): 80' radius blocks plant matter for 20 tn
Barkskin (P2 Alte): Touched gains +1 AC and non-spell saves for 24 rd
Call Lightning (P3 Alte): R360' Clouds release a 10' bolt that inflicts 22d8 HP (Save half) 1/tn for 20 tn
Conjure Earth Elemental (P7 Conj): R40' Summons a 16 HD elemental that assists self for 20 tn (Reverse dismisses)
Conjure Fire Elemental (P6 Conj): R80' Summons a 16 HD elemental that assists self for 20 tn (Reverse dismisses)
Create Water (P1 Alte): R10' Creates (Reverse destroys) 20' cu of potable water
Creeping Doom (P7 Conj): Bugs erupt and attack as directed w/in an 80' radius for 80 rd
Cure Light Wounds (P1 Necr): Touched regains 1d8 HP (Reverse inflicts)
Cure Serious Wounds (P4 Necr): Touched regains 2d8+1 HP (Reverse inflicts)
Detect Magic (P1 Less): Self discerns magical auras in a 10'x60' path for 40 rd
Dispel Magic (P3 Abju): R120' Extinguishes magic in 30' cu (50% +5%/-5% per caster level delta)
Entangle (P1 Alte): R80' Plants in a 20' radius immobilize passers (Save half movement) for 1 tn
Faerie Fire (P1 Alte): R80' Outlines targets in light, giving foes +2 attack, for 80 rd
Locate Animals Or Plants (P1 Less): R500' Self discerns presence of animal or plant type in 20' path for 20 rd
Obscurement (P2 Alte): Creates a mist that limits vision in a 200' cu for 80 rd
Pass Plant (P5 Alte): Self may teleport up to 600 yd between trees of the same species
Pass Without Trace (P1 Ench): Touched leaves no tracks or scent for 20 tn
Plant Door (P4 Alte): Self may move effortlessly through vegetation for 20 tn
Produce Fire (P4 Alte): R40' Creates fire in a 120' sq that inflicts 1d4 HP for 1 rd (Reverse extinguishes)
Produce Flame (P2 Alte): R40' Creates a flame that ignites combustables and may be thrown to burn a 15' radius for 40 rd
Protection From Fire (P3 Abju): Touched gains immunity to normal fire and +4 saves and half damage from magical fire (immunity to magical fire if cast on self) for 240 HP
Protection From Lightning (P4 Abju): Touched gains immunity to normal lightning and +4 saves and half damage from magical lightning (immunity to magical lightning if cast on self) for 240 HP
Shillelagh (P1 Alte): Touched club gains +1 attack and inflicts 2d4 HP for 20 rd
Speak With Plants (P4 Alte): R30' Self may converse w/plants for 20 rd
Sticks To Snakes (P4 Alte): R30' Turns 20 sticks in a 10' cu to snakes (100% venomous) (Reverse turns snakes to sticks) for 40 rd
Stone Shape (P3 Alte): Reshapes 20' cu of stone
Summon Insects (P3 Conj): R30' Covers target w/insects, inflicting 2 HP/rd, for 20 rd
Transmute Metal To Wood (P7 Alte): R80' 160 lb metal object becomes wood
Transmute Rock To Mud (P5 Alte): R160' 400' cu rock becomes mud (Reverse mud becomes rock)
Tree (P3 Alte): Self polymorphs into a tree for 26 tn
Trip (P2 Ench): Touched trips passers, inflicting 1d6 HP and stunning, for 1d4 + 1 rd (Save neg) for 20 tn
Wall Of Thorns (P6 Conj): R80' Creates briars in a 2000' cu that inflict 8 + AC HP for 20 tn
Water Breathing (P3 Alte): Touched may breathe water (Reverse may breathe air) for 60 tn
Weather Summoning (P6 Conj): Controls precipitation, temperature, and wind within d100 sq miles for 4d12 hr
Magic Notes:
Bonus Spells: Spell level P1x2, P2x2, P3, P4
Fluid Appearance: Alter appearance at will
Planar Travel (Air): At-will travel in Plane Of Air
Planar Travel (Earth): At-will travel in Plane Of Earth
Planar Travel (Fire): At-will travel in Plane Of Fire
Planar Travel (Water): At-will travel in Plane Of Water
Shapeshift: May change into a natural animal, regaining 1d6x10% HP, 3/dy
